content: Yes, I do mean the title. This PR has been waiting for a week. Anyone around? :grinning:

I think this PR is difficult to review because it has many different changes: it has some style adjustments, some golfing, some new lemmas unrelated to min/max elements, adds two new definitions, and moves some existing API. Is it possible to decouple some of these, so they can be more clearly reviewed?
For a little more guidance here, there's the documentation about commit types. It makes it easier to evaluate changes when they're individual feat/style/refactor commits, when possible.
Here's a PR that only splits the file #11603. Would be great if it could go through quickly because the tower of dependent PR is growing dangerously big.
